parameters.query:
WITH params AS (
  SELECT 
    {{ $json.category_id }}::INTEGER AS category_id,
    '{{ $('Evaluate existing or new chat').item.json.body.data.message.conversation }}'::INTEGER AS row_number,
    {{ $json.chat_id }}::INTEGER AS chat_id
),
selected_subcategory AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM subcategories
  WHERE category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM params)
  ORDER BY id
  LIMIT 1
  OFFSET (SELECT row_number - 1 FROM params)
),
updated_chat AS (
  UPDATE chats
  SET subcategory_id = (SELECT id FROM selected_subcategory)
  WHERE id = (SELECT chat_id FROM params)
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT
  sc.id AS subcategory_id,
  sc.name AS subcategory_name,
  sc.solution,
  uc.id AS chat_id,
  uc.category_id,
  uc.subcategory_id
FROM selected_subcategory sc
JOIN updated_chat uc ON uc.subcategory_id = sc.id;

parameters.query:
WITH params AS (
  SELECT 
    {{ $json.id }}::INTEGER AS chat_id,
    {{ $json.category_id }}::INTEGER AS category_id
),
first_subcategory AS (
  SELECT id
  FROM subcategories
  WHERE category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM params)
  ORDER BY id
  LIMIT 1
),
updated_chat AS (
  UPDATE chats
  SET
    category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM params),
    subcategory_id = (SELECT id FROM first_subcategory),
    device = 'other',
    location_name = 'other',
    solution_feedback = FALSE
  WHERE id = (SELECT chat_id FROM params)
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT * FROM updated_chat;

parameters.query:
WITH incoming_data AS (
  SELECT 
    '{{ $json.body.data.key.remoteJid.replace("@s.whatsapp.net", "") }}'::TEXT AS phone,
    '{{ $json.body.data.pushName ? $json.body.data.pushName : "WhatsApp User" }}'::TEXT AS name,
    '{{  $json.body.data.message.conversation.split(':')[1].trim()|| null }}'::TEXT AS company -- opcional si viene del JSON
),

found_user AS (
  SELECT id FROM users WHERE phone = (SELECT phone FROM incoming_data)
),

inserted_user AS (
  INSERT INTO users (phone, name, company)
  SELECT phone, name, company
  FROM incoming_data
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM found_user)
  RETURNING id
),

final_user AS (
  SELECT id FROM found_user
  UNION ALL
  SELECT id FROM inserted_user
),

updated_chats AS (
  UPDATE chats
  SET status = 'closed',
      closed_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM final_user)
    AND status = 'open'
  RETURNING *
)

-- Nuevo chat con categorÃ­a y subcategorÃ­a opcionalmente en null
INSERT INTO chats (user_id, category_id, subcategory_id)
SELECT 
  id,
  NULL,      -- â† puedes reemplazar por un nÃºmero si sabes la categorÃ­a (ej: 1)
  NULL      -- â† lo mismo para subcategorÃ­a
FROM final_user;

WITH incoming_data AS (
  SELECT 
    '{{ $json.body.data.key.remoteJid.split("@")[0] }}'::TEXT AS phone
),
found_user AS (
  SELECT id, company FROM users WHERE phone = (SELECT phone FROM incoming_data)
),
open_chat AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM chats
  WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM found_user)
    AND status = 'open'
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  oc.id AS chat_id,
  oc.status,
  oc.category_id,
  oc.subcategory_id,
  oc.location_name,
  oc.device,
  oc.summary,
  oc.created_at,
  oc.closed_at,
  oc.solution_feedback,
  fu.company
FROM open_chat oc
JOIN found_user fu ON fu.id = oc.user_id;
